original_text: “Then the king of the South will march out in a rage and fight against the king of the North, who will raise a large army, but it will be defeated.
korean_text: 남방 왕은 크게 노하여 나와서 북방 왕과 싸울 것이라 북방 왕이 큰 무리를 일으킬 것이나 그 무리는 그의 손에 넘겨 준 바 되리라

sentences.original_text: Then the king of the South will march out in a rage
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 남방의 왕이 분노하여 출진할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and fight against the king of the North
who will raise a large army
